divs: Sighting Detailsstood outside and was looking at stars all of a sudden from no where a light appeared and moved across the sky it was round and bright it moved south to north and at one point it became very bright then settled back down to its original size, .I called my wife and son outside to view this sighting becuase I saw it 2 nights in a row and it was un believable that I went outside the 2cd night and it was there again It stayed bright white the whole time other then the brightning moments I watched this object 2 nights in a row about the same time , both nights I watched this object pass in front of an aircraft that had visible flashing red,green and white aircraft lights, I have other reports from as far back as 1986 also that would make you think twice about going outside.I am going to try and get the light on film, 3 summers ago we saw these same lights night after night in a different part of the sky so I thingk I can get it in sight again. its creepy as hell
Summary: I have witnessed these lights for 5 years now , some extreme brightness changes
